original: @243b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @243b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya sv'a dha nam /
analyzed: pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya sv'a dha nam /
translated: Prajnaparamita-hrdaya-sadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Heart of the Perfection of Wisdom

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Perfection of Wisdom, the mother of the victors of the three times and their offspring!

original: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gzhi yin lam yin 'bras bu'ang de //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gzhi yin lam yin 'bras bu'ang de //
translated: The basis, the path, and the fruit of all the victors of the three times

original: shes rab mi dmigs shes rab snying po gtso bo dbyer med pa //
analyzed: shes rab mi dmigs shes rab snying po gtso bo dbyer med pa //
translated: Are wisdom, the essence of wisdom, the principal, and the inseparable.

original: sku gsum dkon mchog gsum la dbyer med lus ngag yid btud nas //
analyzed: sku gsum dkon mchog gsum la dbyer med lus ngag yid btud nas //
translated: I bow with body, speech, and mind to the inseparable three jewels of the three kayas

original: rgyal yum rim brgyud dad dang shes rab thob phyir bri //
analyzed: rgyal yum rim brgyud dad dang shes rab thob phyir bri //
translated: And write this to obtain faith and wisdom through the lineage of the mother of the victors.

original: dad dang shes rab sngon 'gro skyabs dang sems bskyed cing //
analyzed: dad dang shes rab sngon 'gro skyabs dang sems bskyed cing //
translated: With faith and wisdom as a prerequisite, take refuge and generate the awakening mind.

original: brtson pas grol 'dod bzod ldan sdug bsngal med spangs nas //
analyzed: brtson pas grol 'dod bzod ldan sdug bsngal med spangs nas //
translated: With diligence, desire for liberation, patience, and abandoning suffering,

original: 'jig rten chos brgyad bsam btang nas ni ma nyams te //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos brgyad bsam btang nas ni ma nyams te //
translated: Abandon thoughts of the eight worldly concerns and be undistracted.

original: 'dod yon ma chags khrims ldan ci 'byor mchod dang sbyin //
analyzed: 'dod yon ma chags khrims ldan ci 'byor mchod dang sbyin //
translated: With discipline, whatever one has one offers in worship and in charity.

original: shes rab sbyangs pas shes rab don shes shes rab spyod 'dod pas //
analyzed: shes rab sbyangs pas shes rab don shes shes rab spyod 'dod pas //
translated: With wisdom, one studies and understands the meaning of wisdom and wishes to practice wisdom.

original: rgyal ba'i gnas dang chos 'di gnas su shes rab snying po sgrub //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i gnas dang chos 'di gnas su shes rab snying po sgrub //
translated: In the Victor’s abode and in the abode of this Dharma, one accomplishes the essence of wisdom.

original: gang la chags phyin drug ldan pas khrus byas la //
analyzed: gang la chags phyin drug ldan pas khrus byas la //
translated: Having gone to where one is attached, with the six perfections one bathes.

original: rten la mandala mchod bshams stan la mnyam 'dug ste //
analyzed: rten la mandala mchod bshams stan la mnyam 'dug ste //
translated: Having set up a mandala offering to the support, one sits in equipoise on a seat.

original: bdun brgya pa yi sngags brjod @244a * //
analyzed: bdun brgya pa yi sngags brjod @244a * //
translated: One recites the mantra of the seven hundred.

original: sngags kyi bden pa yis //
analyzed: sngags kyi bden pa yis //
translated: By the truth of the mantra,

original: rten der phun sum tshogs pa sngar bsags spyan der drang //
analyzed: rten der phun sum tshogs pa sngar bsags spyan der drang //
translated: one invites the perfect accumulation of merit that has been gathered in the past to come to that support.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin thob shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin thob shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: One attains the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mang gdul bya 'dul ba'i chos rnam pha rol phyin //
analyzed: thabs mang gdul bya 'dul ba'i chos rnam pha rol phyin //
translated: One perfects the Dharma that tames disciples with many methods.

original: rgyal ba'i yum gyur rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i yum gyur rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la //
translated: To the mother of the Victor, to the Victor and to the Bodhisattvas,

original: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum dang gus deng nas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum dang gus deng nas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: with body, speech and mind, I respectfully pay homage from now on.

original: 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan gyi 'jig rten na //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan gyi 'jig rten na //
translated: In this world and in other worlds,

original: mchod par 'os pa'i gzugs sgra dri dag dang // ro dang reg bya thugs dang mi 'gal ba'i //
analyzed: mchod par 'os pa'i gzugs sgra dri dag dang // ro dang reg bya thugs dang mi 'gal ba'i //
translated: not in conflict with the mind,

original: gtsang dang ma nyams dman par ma gyur pa'i //
analyzed: gtsang dang ma nyams dman par ma gyur pa'i //
translated: pure, unspoiled, and not inferior,

original: chu gtsang bsil dang me tog khyad par can //
analyzed: chu gtsang bsil dang me tog khyad par can //
translated: pure cool water, and special flowers,

original: dbyibs legs dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs mdzes //
analyzed: dbyibs legs dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs mdzes //
translated: well-shaped, fragrant, and beautiful with various colors,

original: tsandan gur kum ga pur la sogs sbyar //
analyzed: tsandan gur kum ga pur la sogs sbyar //
translated: mixed with sandalwood, saffron, camphor, and so forth,🔽as many burning incense offerings as there are,

original: so sor bsreg pa'i bdug pa ji snyed dang // nyi zla ltar gsal rin chen 'od 'bar ba'i //
analyzed: so sor bsreg pa'i bdug pa ji snyed dang // nyi zla ltar gsal rin chen 'od 'bar ba'i //
translated: the light of precious lamps shining like the sun and moon,

original: rin chen sgrol ma mar me mdzes pa'i 'od //
analyzed: rin chen sgrol ma mar me mdzes pa'i 'od //
translated: the beautiful light of lamps of precious Tara,

original: gla rtsi tsandan tu ruska sogs legs sbyar dri //
analyzed: gla rtsi tsandan tu ruska sogs legs sbyar dri //
translated: the fragrance of well-mixed musk, sandalwood, turushka, and so forth,🔽substances for anointing the beautiful body,

original: sku mdzes don du byi dor byug pa rdzas rnams dang // sman dang 'bras chan shing thog tam po le //
analyzed: sku mdzes don du byi dor byug pa rdzas rnams dang // sman dang 'bras chan shing thog tam po le //
translated: medicines, rice, fruits, and tambala,

original: yun ring 'tsho ba rnams kyang rim par dbul //
analyzed: yun ring 'tsho ba rnams kyang rim par dbul //
translated: and long-lasting provisions, I offer in sequence.

original: sgra snyan dbyangs dang sil snyan rol mor bcas //
analyzed: sgra snyan dbyangs dang sil snyan rol mor bcas //
translated: With pleasant sounds, melodies, and musical instruments,

original: rin chen bdun dang rin chen gzhan rnams dang // bkra shis rdzas brgyad gzhan yang bkra shis rdzas //
analyzed: rin chen bdun dang rin chen gzhan rnams dang // bkra shis rdzas brgyad gzhan yang bkra shis rdzas //
translated: and the eight auspicious substances and other auspicious substances,

original: bdag gi lus ngag yid bcas khyod la dbul //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ngag yid bcas khyod la dbul //
translated: I offer to you my body, speech, and mind.

original: rgyal sras thugs rje can gyis bdag gzigs la //
analyzed: rgyal sras thugs rje can gyis bdag gzigs la //
translated: Compassionate children of the victors, look upon me!

original: 'gro gzugs bde bar bya phyir bzhes su gsol //
analyzed: 'gro gzugs bde bar bya phyir bzhes su gsol //
translated: Please accept them in order to bring about the well-being of migrating beings.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
translated: Om sarva tathagata

original: zhes de nyid bsdus pa'i sngags kyis dbul /
analyzed: zhes de nyid bsdus pa'i sngags kyis dbul /
translated: With this mantra from the Compendium of Principles, make the offering.

original: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la bdag re gnong //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la bdag re gnong //
translated: I confess to the victors and their children.

original: 'khor bar ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyis //
analyzed: 'khor bar ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyis //
translated: In samsara, through ignorance, with my body, speech, and mind,🔽I have committed negative actions such as the heinous acts,

original: mtshams med la sogs sdig pa'i las bgyis dang // bgyid du stsal dang rjes su yi rang bshags //
analyzed: mtshams med la sogs sdig pa'i las bgyis dang // bgyid du stsal dang rjes su yi rang bshags //
translated: I have caused others to do so, and I have rejoiced in them.

original: da ni 'jigs so rgyal sras khyed dpang las //
analyzed: da ni 'jigs so rgyal sras khyed dpang las //
translated: Now I am afraid, you children of the victors are my witnesses.

original: lus ngag yid sdig slan chad mi bgyid do //
analyzed: lus ngag yid sdig slan chad mi bgyid do //
translated: I will not commit negative actions of body, speech, and mind again.

original: rgyal sras khyed dang 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag na //
analyzed: rgyal sras khyed dang 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag na //
translated: You children of the victors and in this world and others,

original: 'gro rigs dge ba theg pa rim gyis spyod byed pa'i //
analyzed: 'gro rigs dge ba theg pa rim gyis spyod byed pa'i //
translated: I confess all the negative acts I have done🔽in this and other lifetimes.

original: rgyu 'bras ma 'dres so so'i dge ba bdag yi rang //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras ma 'dres so so'i dge ba bdag yi rang //
translated: I rejoice in each and every virtuous deed, each cause and effect.

original: yi rang dge de zag med 'gro la so sor bsngo //
analyzed: yi rang dge de zag med 'gro la so sor bsngo //
translated: I dedicate this virtue, untainted, to all beings.

original: kun gyi skyabs chen rgyal sras skyabs dgal //
analyzed: kun gyi skyabs chen rgyal sras skyabs dgal //
translated: I take refuge in the Bodhisattvas, the great protectors of all.

original: deng nas bzung @244b ste bdag bskyab skyob par mdzod //
analyzed: deng nas bzung @244b ste bdag bskyab skyob par mdzod //
translated: From now on, protect me, save me, I pray.

original: skyabs gnas khyed ltar bdag kyang sems bskyed pas //
analyzed: skyabs gnas khyed ltar bdag kyang sems bskyed pas //
translated: By arousing bodhichitta, may I become like you,🔽And like you, may I work for the benefit of beings.

original: khyod kyis spyod ltar bdag spyod 'gro ba'i don byed shog / rgyal sras khyod kyis sna tshogs sku sprul la //
analyzed: khyod kyis spyod ltar bdag spyod 'gro ba'i don byed shog / rgyal sras khyod kyis sna tshogs sku sprul la //
translated: You, O children of the Conqueror, emanate in various forms

original: 'gro ba grol ba'i rim par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
analyzed: 'gro ba grol ba'i rim par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
translated: And turn the wheel of Dharma in accordance with the needs of those to be trained.

original: 'gro ba so sor bde lam byang chub ma thob par //
analyzed: 'gro ba so sor bde lam byang chub ma thob par //
translated: Until all beings have attained the path of bliss and the state of enlightenment,

original: rgyal ba sras bcas mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras bcas mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol //
translated: I pray that you, O Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, will not pass into nirvana.

original: phyag 'tshal mchod sogs byas pa'i dge ba rgya chen de //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal mchod sogs byas pa'i dge ba rgya chen de //
translated: The virtue that I have accumulated through prostration, offering, and so on,

original: 'gro la bsngos pas 'gro ba so sor bde ba dang // ma grol grol dang ma bsgal bsgral dang dbugs phyin dang // mya ngan ma 'das pa dag mya ngan 'da' bar shog / rgyal sras dbang por rgyal sras lta bur bdag gis ni //
analyzed: 'gro la bsngos pas 'gro ba so sor bde ba dang // ma grol grol dang ma bsgal bsgral dang dbugs phyin dang // mya ngan ma 'das pa dag mya ngan 'da' bar shog / rgyal sras dbang por rgyal sras lta bur bdag gis ni //
translated: and may those not liberated be liberated, those not freed be freed, those not comforted be comforted, and those not in nirvāṇa attain nirvāṇa.🔽I, like a bodhisattva, will go to the abode of the victors and their children,

original: tshad med bzhi bsgom rgyal ba sras bcas gnas su gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi bsgom rgyal ba sras bcas gnas su gshegs su gsol //
translated: and meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin shes dngos po rnams stong pas //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin shes dngos po rnams stong pas //
translated: Knowing the perfection of wisdom, I know that things are empty.🔽By reciting the svabhāva mantra, I am empty, and things are empty.

original: sva bh'a'i sngags kyis stong par bzlas pas dngos stong dang // sh'u n+ya t'a brjod gzung ba nyid dang bral //
analyzed: sva bh'a'i sngags kyis stong par bzlas pas dngos stong dang // sh'u n+ya t'a brjod gzung ba nyid dang bral //
translated: By reciting śūnyatā, I am free from the nature of being apprehended.🔽Without apprehending, without abiding, the mind rests in equipoise.

original: 'dzin med gnas pa med par blo mnyam gzhag / mnyam pa'i ngang las ri rgyal dmigs byas la //
analyzed: 'dzin med gnas pa med par blo mnyam gzhag / mnyam pa'i ngang las ri rgyal dmigs byas la //
translated: From the state of equipoise, I visualize the king of mountains.

original: de las rim gyis byung bas gling rnams chags //
analyzed: de las rim gyis byung bas gling rnams chags //
translated: From that, in stages, the continents are formed.🔽On the mountain, from pam pad ā, a moon,

original: ri steng pam pad aa las zla ba dang // seng ge'i khri la rin po che yi khri //
analyzed: ri steng pam pad aa las zla ba dang // seng ge'i khri la rin po che yi khri //
translated: and on that, a lion throne, a jeweled throne,

original: rin chen yon tan rgyan rnams legs gsal nas //
analyzed: rin chen yon tan rgyan rnams legs gsal nas //
translated: and the ornaments of precious qualities are clearly visualized.

original: khri steng padma sna tshogs lte ba la //
analyzed: khri steng padma sna tshogs lte ba la //
translated: On the lotus in the center of the throne,

original: yi ge mam ser 'phro 'du las //🔽'og tu zla ba a'a li las //
analyzed: yi ge mam ser 'phro 'du las // 'og tu zla ba a'a li las //
translated: from the yellow syllable mam,🔽below, the moon is accomplished from the āli,

original: steng du k'a li nyi ma grub //
analyzed: steng du k'a li nyi ma grub //
translated: and above, the sun is accomplished from the kāli.

original: de yi 'khor lo 'phro 'du las //
analyzed: de yi 'khor lo 'phro 'du las //
translated: From the emanation and reabsorption of that wheel,

original: lte bar zla ba mam gnas pa //
analyzed: lte bar zla ba mam gnas pa //
translated: at the center, the moon and the mam abide.

original: thams cad gcig gyur bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: thams cad gcig gyur bcom ldan 'das //
translated: All become one, the Bhagavān.

original: shar du pam las yum nyid bzhengs //
analyzed: shar du pam las yum nyid bzhengs //
translated: In the east, the mother arises from pam.

original: lho ru h'um las phyag rdo rje //
analyzed: lho ru h'um las phyag rdo rje //
translated: In the south, Vajrapāṇi arises from hūṃ.

original: nub tu mam las sh'a ri'i bu //
analyzed: nub tu mam las sh'a ri'i bu //
translated: In the west, Śāriputra arises from mam.

original: byang du hr'i: las spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: byang du hr'i: las spyan ras gzigs //
translated: In the north, Avalokiteśvara arises from hriḥ.🔽The Bhagavān is golden, teaching dharma,

original: bcom ldan gser mdog chos 'chad phyag / rdo rje skyil krung gtsug tor bcas //
analyzed: bcom ldan gser mdog chos 'chad phyag / rdo rje skyil krung gtsug tor bcas //
translated: in vajra posture, with an uṣṇīṣa.

original: spyan yangs mthing ga mjod  spur ldan //
analyzed: spyan yangs mthing ga mjod  spur ldan //
translated: His eyes are wide, blue, and have eyelashes.

original: sku yi sgo nas 'od zer 'gyed //
analyzed: sku yi sgo nas 'od zer 'gyed //
translated: Light rays radiate from his body.

original: yum ni longs spyod rgyan can te //
analyzed: yum ni longs spyod rgyan can te //
translated: The mother is endowed with ornaments of wealth,

original: gser mdog sku ni shin tu rgyas //
analyzed: gser mdog sku ni shin tu rgyas //
translated: golden, and very plump.

original: pad zla rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: pad zla rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: She sits on a seat of a full moon and lotus.🔽Her two hands are in the gesture of equipoise,

original: phyag gnyis mnyam pa'i ting 'dzin gzhag / g-yas pa chos 'chad pa dang ldan //
analyzed: phyag gnyis mnyam pa'i ting 'dzin gzhag / g-yas pa chos 'chad pa dang ldan //
translated: and she holds the gesture of teaching dharma.

original: g-yon pa pusti 'dzin pa'o //🔽phyag na rdo rje zhal gcig pa //
analyzed: g-yon pa pusti 'dzin pa'o // phyag na rdo rje zhal gcig pa //
translated: and in the left, a book.🔽Vajrapāṇi has one face

original: sngon po g-yas na rdo rje bsam //
analyzed: sngon po g-yas na rdo rje bsam //
translated: and is blue, with a vajra in the right hand

original: @245a * // g-yon na padma 'dzin par byed //
analyzed: @245a * // g-yon na padma 'dzin par byed //
translated: and a lotus in the left.

original: rin chen rgyan ldan skyil krung bcas //
analyzed: rin chen rgyan ldan skyil krung bcas //
translated: He is adorned with jewels and sits cross-legged.

original: sh'a ri ser po dka' thub gzugs //
analyzed: sh'a ri ser po dka' thub gzugs //
translated: Śāriputra is yellow and has the form of an ascetic,

original: chos gos gsum dang gsil byed g-yas //🔽pus btsugs g-yon na lhung bzed thogs //
analyzed: chos gos gsum dang gsil byed g-yas // pus btsugs g-yon na lhung bzed thogs //
translated: with the three Dharma robes and a begging bowl in the right hand,🔽and a water pot in the left,

original: lus ngag bsdams nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: lus ngag bsdams nas gnas pa'o //
translated: and he sits with his right knee on the ground.

original: mgon po byang sems spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: mgon po byang sems spyan ras gzigs //
translated: The protector Bodhisattva Avalokiteśvara

original: rgyan mdzes sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
analyzed: rgyan mdzes sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
translated: is beautifully adorned and sits in the bodhisattva posture,🔽with a lotus and the boon-granting gesture in the right hand

original: g-yas na padma mchog sbyin dang // g-yon na padma pusti 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yas na padma mchog sbyin dang // g-yon na padma pusti 'dzin //
translated: and a lotus and a book in the left.

original: de rnams zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: de rnams zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: They all sit on moon seats.

original: gsal bar gyur nas phyogs kun du //
analyzed: gsal bar gyur nas phyogs kun du //
translated: Once they are clear, in all directions

original: byang chub sems dang nyan thos gzugs //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang nyan thos gzugs //
translated: the forms of bodhisattvas and śrāvakas

original: 'gro ba so so'i gzugs 'dzin pa ;
analyzed: 'gro ba so so'i gzugs 'dzin pa ;
translated: take on the forms of individual beings.

original: / steng 'og phyogs rnams thams cad du //
analyzed: / steng 'og phyogs rnams thams cad du //
translated: Above, below, and in all directions

original: rang rang mdog dang mtshan mas bskyed //
analyzed: rang rang mdog dang mtshan mas bskyed //
translated: they are generated with their own colors and marks.

original: de nas bdag po'i mig sogs la //
analyzed: de nas bdag po'i mig sogs la //
translated: Then, in the eyes, etc. of the Lord,

original: ksham dzam kham gam skam sam rnams //
analyzed: ksham dzam kham gam skam sam rnams //
translated: are kṣaṃ, jaṃ, khaṃ, gaṃ, saṃ, and saṃ,

original: zla ba padma gdan spro bsdu //
analyzed: zla ba padma gdan spro bsdu //
translated: which emanate and reabsorb moon and lotus seats.

original: de nyid gsum yang gnas gsum du //
analyzed: de nyid gsum yang gnas gsum du //
translated: The three realities are also in the three places,

original: sbro  bsdu mtshan ma gsum du bsgom //
analyzed: sbro  bsdu mtshan ma gsum du bsgom //
translated: emanated and reabsorbed, meditated on as the three signs.🔽The entry of awareness, the conferral of empowerment,🔽and abiding in Akṣobhya, etc.,

original: ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang // mi bskyod la sogs so sor gzhag / sh'a ri'i spyi bor rgyal ba nyid //
analyzed: ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang // mi bskyod la sogs so sor gzhag / sh'a ri'i spyi bor rgyal ba nyid //
translated: the Victor himself on Śāriputra’s crown,

original: gsang dbang spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: gsang dbang spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: the Vajra Holder on the crown of the empowerment of secrets,

original: mgon la 'od dpag yum nyid la //
analyzed: mgon la 'od dpag yum nyid la //
translated: the Protector, and Ākāśā, the mother herself,

original: mi bskyod gnas la mchod pa dbul //
analyzed: mi bskyod gnas la mchod pa dbul //
translated: make offerings to the abode of Akṣobhya.

original: 'o thug spro bsdu mdun gyi yum //
analyzed: 'o thug spro bsdu mdun gyi yum //
translated: The nectar emanated and reabsorbed in front of the mother,

original: bdag la bsdus la snying po'i don //
analyzed: bdag la bsdus la snying po'i don //
translated: collected into oneself, the meaning of the essence,

original: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
analyzed: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
translated: all phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,

original: thams cad bdag gis gsal bsgoms la //
analyzed: thams cad bdag gis gsal bsgoms la //
translated: are clearly meditated on by myself.

original: spyan ras gzigs dang der sems la //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dang der sems la //
translated: Avalokiteśvara and the mind there,

original: sh'a ris zhus dang ldan btab pa'i //
analyzed: sh'a ris zhus dang ldan btab pa'i //
translated: the sūtra endowed with the request of Śāriputra,

original: mdo don skabs shes don dam bsgom //
analyzed: mdo don skabs shes don dam bsgom //
translated: the meaning of the sūtra is understood, the ultimate is meditated.

original: skyo na bden pa'i ngag 'don ta //
analyzed: skyo na bden pa'i ngag 'don ta //
translated: If one is weary, recite the words of truth.

original: tadya th'a dang aom spel nas //
analyzed: tadya th'a dang aom spel nas //
translated: After adding tadyathā and oṃ,

original: ga te ga te p'a ra dang // ga te p'a ra sam ga te //
analyzed: ga te ga te p'a ra dang // ga te p'a ra sam ga te //
translated: “Gate gate pāragate,

original: bo dhi sv'a h'a zhes brjod la //
analyzed: bo dhi sv'a h'a zhes brjod la //
translated: pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā.”

original: snying gar padma'i lte ba la //
analyzed: snying gar padma'i lte ba la //
translated: At the heart, in the center of a lotus,

original: mam ser bdag la g-yas skor bgrang //
analyzed: mam ser bdag la g-yas skor bgrang //
translated: is a yellow maṃ, which circles to the right.🔽If you wish to meditate, gather the retinue

original: bsam gtan 'dod na 'khor rnams dang // bdag nyid yi ge mam la bsdu //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'dod na 'khor rnams dang // bdag nyid yi ge mam la bsdu //
translated: and yourself into the syllable maṃ.

original: de la rim bskyed 'khor rnams la //🔽mdo gdon sngags kyis 'khor rnams kun //
analyzed: de la rim bskyed 'khor rnams la // mdo gdon sngags kyis 'khor rnams kun //
translated: In that, the retinue is generated in stages.🔽With the mantra of the sūtra recitation,

original: sgrib sbyangs bdag 'drar gyur pa la //
analyzed: sgrib sbyangs bdag 'drar gyur pa la //
translated: all the retinue is purified of obscurations, becoming like me.

original: rgyal ba'i yum nyid bstan pa yi //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i yum nyid bstan pa yi //
translated: The mother of the victors herself is revealed.

original: dge ba bdag gis ci byas thams cad ni //
analyzed: dge ba bdag gis ci byas thams cad ni //
translated: All the virtue I have created

original: sems can kun la byang chub phyir bsngo bas //
analyzed: sems can kun la byang chub phyir bsngo bas //
translated: I dedicate to the enlightenment of all beings.🔽May I and others attain the essence of wisdom.

original: bdag gzhan shes rab snying po thob par shog / rjes la sgyu ma'i blo yis langs //
analyzed: bdag gzhan shes rab snying po thob par shog / rjes la sgyu ma'i blo yis langs //
translated: Afterward, with an illusory mind,

original: lha yi snang ba la gnas la //
analyzed: lha yi snang ba la gnas la //
translated: I abide in the appearance of the deity.

original: bya ba thams cad @245b rgyal bas spyad //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad @245b rgyal bas spyad //
translated: All activities are performed by the victors.

original: ci spyad mthar phyin lam yin pas //
analyzed: ci spyad mthar phyin lam yin pas //
translated: Whatever is practiced is the path to perfection.

original: sems gnyis phyin drug sems kyis bya //
analyzed: sems gnyis phyin drug sems kyis bya //
translated: With the two minds, the six pāramitās are performed.

original: 'di don shes rab snying po ste //
analyzed: 'di don shes rab snying po ste //
translated: The meaning of this is the essence of wisdom.

original: rmi lam sgyu mas bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: rmi lam sgyu mas bzlas brjod bya //
translated: Recite with the mantra of dream and illusion.

original: dka' bas klu yi lag nas blangs //
analyzed: dka' bas klu yi lag nas blangs //
translated: Take it from the hands of the nāgas with difficulty.

original: yun ring mdo rnams legs spyad la //
analyzed: yun ring mdo rnams legs spyad la //
translated: For a long time, practice the sūtras well.

original: rgyal yum 'di byas dge ba yis //
analyzed: rgyal yum 'di byas dge ba yis //
translated: By the virtue of composing this Mother of the Victorious Ones,🔽may beings attain the mother of wisdom.

original: 'gro bas shes rab yum thob shog / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro bas shes rab yum thob shog / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of the Heart of the Perfection of Wisdom composed by the great master Nāgārjunagarbha is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bee ro tsa na rakshi ta dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba klan chung gis bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bee ro tsa na rakshi ta dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba klan chung gis bsgyur ba'o //
translated: It was translated by the Indian preceptor Vairocanarakṣita and the Tibetan translator Klenchung.

original: slad kyis stag lo ts'a bas bcos pa'o /
analyzed: slad kyis stag lo ts'a bas bcos pa'o /
translated: Later, it was revised by the translator Tag.
